snippet.title: Acheron Steam Trailer (indie boomer shooter)
snippet.description:
Play : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1634900/ACHERON/

Short trailer showcasing some progress

ACHERON is a brutal retro FPS with intense gunplay and visceral melee combat with PSX visuals. Wage a relentless war against hordes of enemies in a blood-soaked decaying world. Unleash your arsenal and leave behind you a river of death.


Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_6hQy4elsyHhCOskZo0U5g
